data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "In general, people are living longer today. Discuss some of the implications of this phenomenon."
data.answer: The controversial issue in respect of living longer has drawn huge public attention and sparked a heated debate in today's society. As far as I am concerned, there are both advantageous and disadvantageous implications brought by this phenomenon. To begin with, it is commonly acknowledged that people living longer marks the advancement of civilization. With a prolonged lifespan, people get to experience a lot more, even after retirement, than they could before. On the flip side of the coin, people living longer will eventually lead to a dramatic change in demographic structure, which can in turn pose a number of challenges to human society. For instance, a greater elderly population means a greater financial burden for the government as elder people generally use more services in the welfare system.
